title: GD I need more slow piano music

embed.description: FREE MP3 at http://livingroomsongs.olafurarnalds.com The fifth song of Ã“lafur Arnald's "Living Room Songs". This is an idea from last August, it had lots of electronics in it and a big arrangement. But I had been struggling with it for a while and was never really happy with it.

body:
This is one of my favorites, especially if it's raining outside

_The_ calmest experience you can ever have. Take this shit outside on a bluetooth speaker and just watch the rain. Love it.
